name: 2018- The 2th International Conference on Robotics and Automation Sciences ICRAS
content: Conference official website:http://www.icras.org/ Meeting time：June 23-25, 2018 Meeting place：Room 301, 2nd Floor, No.2 Teaching Building, West Area of the campus, No. 388 Lumo Road,Wuhan, P.R. China keynote speakers Prof. Mengchu Zhou IEEE Fellow, IFAC Fellow, AAAS Fellow New Jersey Institute of Technology, USA Prof. Zhang Dan, PhD, PEng., FCAE, FEIC, FASME, FCSME, SMIEEE Kaneff Research Chair in Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics Professor and Chair Department of Mechanical Engineering Lassonde School of Engineering York University, Canada Published by：The accepted paper of ICRAS 2018 will be published in conference proceedings. The proceedings will be submitted and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and others. Paper Submission: 1-April.-2018 Acceptance Notice: 25-April.-2018 Registration Due: 10-May.-2018 Call for papers: Genetic Algorithms Fuzzy Contro Decision Support Systems Machine Learning in Control Applications Hybrid Learning Systems Conference Contact: Ms. Yui L. Liana mailbox: icras\_conf@outlook.com Tel:+861-329-000000-2
